Uses of Package
sheep.input

Packages that use sheep.input
sheep.game Contains classes related to game logic. 
sheep.gui Contains the graphical user interface system. 
sheep.input Contains the input singletons and interfaces for listening to events generated by these singletons. 
 

Classes in sheep.input used by sheep.game
KeyboardListener
          An interface for classes which want to subscribe for events on the keyboard.
TouchListener
          Objects can subscribe to touch events by implementing this interface.
 

Classes in sheep.input used by sheep.gui
KeyboardListener
          An interface for classes which want to subscribe for events on the keyboard.
TouchListener
          Objects can subscribe to touch events by implementing this interface.
 

Classes in sheep.input used by sheep.input
Keyboard
          This singleton class tracks the state of the keyboard.
KeyboardListener
          An interface for classes which want to subscribe for events on the keyboard.
Touch
          This singleton class tracks the state of the touchscreen.
TouchListener
          Objects can subscribe to touch events by implementing this interface.
